mapper.insert: INSERT into post_tb(user_uid, page_uid, main_uid, title, content) value(#{userUid}, #{pageUid}, #{mainUid}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT post_tb.uid as post_uid, users_tb.nickname, title, post_tb.created_at FROM post_tb INNER JOIN users_tb ON post_tb.user_uid = users_tb.uid WHERE page_uid=#{pageUid};

select post_tb.uid as post_uid, users_tb.nickname, main_categories.category_name, post_tb.created_at from post_tb inner join users_tb on post_tb.user_uid = users_tb.uid inner join main_categories on post_tb.main_uid = main_categories.uid where post_tb.user_uid = #{userUid};
mapper.update: update post_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, page_uid=#{pageUid}, main_uid=#{mainUid} where post_tb.uid=#{uid} and user_uid = #{userUid}
